Title: Relates to the completion of and information contained in heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems assessments as part of building condition surveys for purposes of grant eligibility
Summary: Relates to the completion of and information contained in heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems assessments as part of building condition surveys for purposes of grant eligibility; requires such assessments to include a report containing specific information and includes qualification requirements for the person completing the report.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to assessments of heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems as part of building condition surveys for purposes of grant eligibility
